Text: Sweeeeet... I've missed a Wipeout-like game for years. Ballistics was too straight forward and short. Let's hope this is a more diverse game. If anyone know of any similar games for PC I'd like hear of it.
anyone played this yet? worth the download?
We don't know what you like... You have to try it for yourself. I personally like it so far.
